title: Ukraine Humanitarian Crisis Worsens, as Biden Heads to Europe
sub_head: U.N. chief calls war unwinnable and decries Russia’s assault on Ukrainian city of Mariupol
body:
ZAPORIZHZHIA, Ukraine—Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is betting that a battery of high-level multinational talks about to unfold in Brussels will yield help for his country and sanctions on Russia, as President Biden heads to Europe to punish Moscow for the monthlong assault on Ukraine that is exacting an ever higher humanitarian cost.
“Three important summits this week: the G-7, NATO and the EU. New sanctions packages, new aid,” Mr. Zelensky said overnight.
